rng = np.random.RandomState(123456)
dcs_test = BaseDCS(selection_method='diff', diff_thresh=0.15, random_state=rng)
selected_clf = dcs_test.select(np.array(competences))
assert np.allclose(selected_clf, expected)
pytest.mark.parametrize('competences, expected', [([1.0, 0.5, 0.5], 0), ([
    0.8, 0.9, 1.0], 2), ([0.0, 0.0, 0.15], 2)])
